scripts.clean: wp-env stop; rm -rf build node_modules vendor
scripts.clean:commit: wp-scripts build && rm -rf vendor && composer dump-autoload --optimize
scripts.makepot: ./vendor/bin/wp i18n make-pot . --skip-audit --exclude=".dev,.github,docs,dist,node_modules,vendor,wordpress" --headers='{"Last-Translator":"plugins@godaddy.com","Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://github.com/godaddy-wordpress/godaddy-launch/issues"}' --file-comment="Copyright (c) $(date +'%Y') GoDaddy Operating Company, LLC. All Rights Reserved." languages/godaddy-launch.pot
scripts.json2po: cd languages && find . -name '*.json' ! -name 'godaddy-launch*.json' -execdir /bin/bash -c 'FROM="$0" && TO="godaddy-launch-`basename $0 .json`.po" && echo "$FROM > $TO" && ../vendor/bin/json2po godaddy-launch.json $FROM $TO && msgmerge --previous $TO godaddy-launch.pot > $TO-msgmerge && mv $TO-msgmerge $TO && if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then sed -i "" -e "/^#, fuzzy$/d" $TO; else sed -i -e "/^#, fuzzy$/d" $TO; fi;' '{}' \;
scripts.po2mo: cd languages && find . -name '*.po' -execdir /bin/bash -c 'FROM="$0" && TO="`basename $0 .po`.mo" && echo "$FROM > $TO" && msgfmt $FROM -o $TO' '{}' \;
scripts.makejson: for f in ./languages/*.po; do ./vendor/bin/wp i18n make-json "$f" --no-purge; done
scripts.reset:site: wp-env run cli wp option update coblocks_site_content_controls_enabled 1 && wp-env run cli wp option update coblocks_site_design_controls_enabled 1 && wp-env run cli wp option patch update wpseo configuration_finished_steps '{}' --format=json
scripts.reset:live-site-control: wp-env run cli wp option delete blog_public gdl_live_site_dismiss gdl_site_published
scripts.reset:publish-guide: wp-env run cli wp option delete gdl_all_tasks_completed gdl_pgi_site_content gdl_pgi_site_design gdl_pgi_site_domain gdl_pgi_site_info gdl_pgi_site_media gdl_publish_guide_interacted sitelogo theme_mods_go
scripts.reset:seo: wp-env run cli wp option delete gdl_pgi_site_seo
scripts.lint:php: wp-env run --env-cwd="wp-content/plugins/${PWD##*/}" cli composer run-script lint
scripts.version: node .dev/bin/update-version.js && wp-scripts build && rm -rf vendor && composer dump-autoload --optimize && git add -A
